thread.section_title: The Wall Street Journal & Breaking News, Business, Financial and Economic News, World News and Video
thread.title: Executives at Cambridge Analytica Tout Entrapment Tactics on Video

author: Rebecca Ballhaus
title: Executives at Cambridge Analytica Tout Entrapment Tactics on Video

organizations.name: cambridge analytica tout entrapment tactics on video executives

text:
Executives at Cambridge Analytica, a data firm that worked for President Donald Trump’s 2016 campaign, advertised campaign tactics—such as entrapping political opponents with bribes and sex—in a sales pitch captured by undercover journalists at British broadcaster Channel 4.
In a series of meetings between November and January with Cambridge Analytica Chief Executive Alexander Nix and Mark Turnbull, the managing director of the company’s international political operation, a Channel 4 reporter posed as a “fixer” for a client...
